casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Steve Dattilo (6618)

Borden, Spallone and Daly, Js.

Argued December 20, 1988 decision released January 3, 1989 Robert M. Casale, with whom, on the brief was Tara L. Knight, law student intern, for the appellant (defendant). Paul J. Ferencek, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was Timothy Pothin, former assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
